name: Squid Dreams
description:
Use 2 Gamepads for better experience.

Cover the Squid with blankets if you're "The Heater".

Take of blankets from the Squid if you're "The Freezer".

Player which takes the temperature to it's side within 2 minutes wins.

Moving : Left Analog

First Action : A (Xbox) / X (Dualshock)

Second Action : RB (Xbox) / R1 (Dualshock)
